fields.body:
{% extends 'rah/base_email.html' %} {% block email_content %}

Hi {{ recipient.first_name }},

I’m Shira, the Field Director for Repower at Home. My job is to bring the enthusiasm for saving energy that you find on repowerathome.com into the real world by working with leaders like you.

I see you recently created a community on repowerathome.com, {{ content_object}}. Nice! Communities are a great way for a community to share ideas, compete with friends and work together to save energy.

As the community administrator, you can invite people to your community, moderate discussions and more by using the tools on your community’s page. Get started by inviting some friends to join your community. Try it out now.

Repower at Home communities often work to organize events in their communities, like energy meetings and challenges to recruit Trendsetters. The Repower at Home field team can tell you more about these opportunities. To get in touch, drop us a line at field@repowerathome.com. We’d love to hear your ideas for getting others energized about saving energy.

Happy energy savings,
Shira Miller
Field Director, Repower at Home

{% endblock %}
fields.name: You've created a community
fields.subject: Organizing your Repower at Home community
